name: Rvinyl Automotive DIY Car Window Tinting Kit - Customize Shade: 5%, 20%, 35%, 50% for Front, Back Windows & Rear Windshield - (Fits for US Coupe/Sedan/SUV/Van/Pickup Truck Only, Non-Semi)
short_description: Rvinyl offers a range of precut window tints that are custom made to fit your vehicle perfectly. These tints are designed to make the installation process easier, saving you valuable time and money. With Rvinyl, you can enjoy the benefits of professionally tinted windows without any of the hassle or expense.

To customize your vehicle's window tint, click on the "Customize Now" yellow button. You will be prompted to provide the year, make, and model of your vehicle, along with the desired shade of tint you would like. You can choose from a range of VLT (Visible Light Transmission) options, ranging from 5% to 50%. You can even opt for practice tint options to perfect your installation skills! The available tint options are for front door, rear door, cargo windows, rear windshields, and front windshield visor strips. You can buy only the tint you need in any shade combination offered!

Improve your driving experience with our window tinting kit. The tinting provides several benefits, such as reducing sun glare, protecting against harsh UV rays, and keeping the interior of your car cooler. With improved privacy and comfort, every ride will be more enjoyable. Whether you're an experienced DIYer or a first-timer, you'll appreciate the quality and ease of this convenient tinting kit. As a car enthusiast, you take pride in maintaining and improving your vehicle, and our tinting kit is an excellent way to do just that.

We offer two types of car window films - a 1-Ply Rvinyl Pro Grade film and a 2-Ply Avery Dennison NR Nano Ceramic IR film. Our warranties range from 3 years to a lifetime, depending on the type of film you choose. Both films are metal-free and will not interfere with any electronic equipment. Additionally, they block up to 99% of harmful UV rays, provide high optical clarity and enhance the color tone of your vehicle. This upgrade will give your car a stylish and sophisticated appearance.

short_description: Reduced Sun Glare - The window tint blocks sun glare, ensuring a cooler interior and preventing harmful UV rays from getting inside. Make journeys comfortable and relaxing with our pre cut tint windows for car.

Easy Installation - Since the tint will already be shaped according to your car's window specifications. You just need to remove the protective film from the car window tint and simply apply it on the windows.

name: Mandark 18PCS Car Window Tint Kit, Vehicle Glass Protective Film Wrapping Installation Set, Auto Vinyl Wrap Tinting Tools Included Squeegees, Felt Squeege, Cutting Knife with Blades
short_description: 【Durable Material】: Our products are made of plastic material and metal material. Plastic material has better softness, which can better adapt to the concave and convex curvature of the car window, thus avoiding scratches or damage in the process of sticking the film. Metal has high durability and hardness, which can keep our products sharp and intact for a long time.

【Versatile Squeegees】: Our products are well-designed and can easily scrape away air bubbles between the film and the window glass, which can make the film more flat and close, thus significantly improving the efficiency of film application. Our products can be used on the car window parts with large concave and convex curvature, such as the edge of the window, the front and rear windshields with large curvature, thus ensuring that the film can also achieve a good fit on these parts.

【Universal Application】: Our product is easy to carry and can be widely used for auto glass tinting, vinyl film, wall decals, posters, wallpaper installation, all types of paint protection film, decals, solar film, wrap film. It is not only suitable for cutting window film, wallpaper, vinyl sheet. It can easily cut out the shape you want and it is perfect for use at home, garage, office or warehouse.

【Convenient to Use】: Metal utility knives are sharp and durable and can easily cut window film without damaging the window glass. First, you should use the film cutter to cut the film to fit the shape and size of the window. Next, you'll need the metal-handled squeegee to scrape away moisture and air bubbles from the glass to ensure that the film fits snugly against the glass. Finally, you can use a triangular squeegee to push the film.

【Package Includes】: Our product package includes 1 metal utility knife, 10 snap blades, 1 metal handle squeegee, 1 blue felt squeegee, 1 medium yellow squeegee, 1 small yellow triangle squeegee, 1 mini pink squeegee, 1 white block squeegee, and 1 black squeegee. With this window tinting kit, you'll be fully prepared for any tinting or vinyl wrap project, thus ensuring smooth results every time.
